header.title: Congresswoman Makes Racist Native American 'War Cry'
header.subtitle: NA
header.postText: Congresswoman Loretta Sanchez made a racist Native American 'war cry' in front a group of Americans of Indian origin! Sanchez insulted multiple ethnicities during her U.S. Senate campaign.. . Subscribe for more videos: http://www.youtube.com/channel/UCV3Nm.... . Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ajplusenglish. . Download the AJ+ app at http://www.ajplus.net/. . Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/ajplus

Many of my cousins, family, and elders suffer from drug abuse and alcoholism; it's quite easy to point the finger at us, but please understand the gray area to why many of us suffer from this. Many of my elders were ripped away from their mothers and fathers, beaten to not speak their language and forced to believe in a religion not accustomed to our own faith. The PTSD they suffer, just like any man, makes them irrational and immoral. So please, recognize the gray area.

commentThread.commentText: Idiot

A native American is ANY American BORN IN America!! The term native American used to describe only American Indians is a relatively recent phenomenon in the history of America and is a result of the ignorance, madness, and lies of political correctness. Those who practice the ignorance, madness and lies of political correctness do not get to redefine the word native, and in the process insult every other native American that is not American Indian!! Approximately 90% of ALL AMERICANS are native American!! American Indians it is great for you all to be proud to be a part of such an amazing country and whatever tribe you associate with, but please don't resort to ignorance and racism in using the term native American while excluding other fellow native Americans who are not America n Indian. It is at best being ignorant and at worst bei ng racist. The ignorance, madness, and lies of political correctness will destroy America if Americans do not take a stand for what is true.

commentThread.commentText: She seems very embarrassed but the fact she thought about it, acted it out... She just should have said native Americans.

replies.commentText: @Clifton Haralson Dude she a fucking bitch for that shit, people who do shit like that are not capable of being embarrassed.
@Bigga Numba Six She was literally RUNNING AWAY she was so embarrassed, everyone does stupid stuff, if you don't you aren't doing anything at all.

@MrSquigglies sure everyone does stupid stuff , but when people in power do stupid stuff it has large consequences. Remember the Iraq war among other things? We expect people in power to be more knowledgeable. more rational than those who they have power over.
@peterpiperdiedharper I think a stupid slip in a speech is a far cry from a war despite what some media outlets want
@MrSquigglies true, but that's not what i was alluding to. I wanted to point out the backwards mentality that seems prevalent among our leaders.

@peterpiperdiedharper what I was alluding to was the unnecessary nitpicking and persecution between political ideologies, AJ+ is a very liberal outlet and this is just a little act of stupidity that this organization is trying to turn into a big deal. I did that very same act in kindergarten when we were learning about the Native Americans, my guess is in that moment she couldn't think of another way to differentiate the Asian Indian and American Indian cultures and just goofed, and it is very obvious that she immediately regretted it. Even the America n Indian lady they were interviewing didn't seem very upset about it.

@MrSquigglies i would not compare the act of a kindergartner to that of someone running for government office. She was embarrassed but, only because she got caught doing it. It may not be intentionally racist, but it speaks of what she usually thinks of Native Indians because, it was the first thing she used as an example. That's where the problem is, not what her color is, but her disposition towards a group of people based on what little knowledge she gathered from old western movies(perhaps). It's like the idea that people from Texas are gun wieldin g hillbilly, or black people are thugs playing loud hip hop in their cars. She is running for a major position, she has to know and understand the diversity of the people and the value of th eir ethnicity. Frankly, she seemed like a go getter in the small clip provided. Those who seek power are often the least suited to use it it seems, or sth like that.
@peterpiperdiedharper I would not base a woman's entire psyche on one passing comment

@MrSquigglies
neither do I. All I point out is the callous nature she has shown regarding the native Americans.
+Melinda  Swafford Who said Native American women are beautiful? I've lived half my life in South Dakota. Remember that before you answer.
